form.description: This dashboard displays an overview of the diving you have done at a specific dive site, or at many dive sites.

search.query: search country="$country$" | dedup divesitename | table divesitename

| rex field=duration mode=sed "s/'//g" | rex field=duration mode=sed "s/ min//g" | reverse | table duration name | rex field=duration "(?<minutes>\d+):(?<seconds>\d+)" | eval total_seconds=minutes*60+seconds | sort + name | stats sum(total_seconds) as "total_hours" | eval total_hours=round(total_hours/60/60,2) | rename total_hours AS "Total Hours Under Water" | rename name as "Dive Site"
reverse | stats avg(airtemp) as "Minimum Air Temperature (째C)"
reverse | stats max(maxdepth) as max_depth | rename max_depth as "Max Depth (in Meters)"
reverse | stats avg(meandepth) as mean_depth| rename mean_depth as "Average Depth (in Meters)"

reverse | rex mode=sed field=visibility "s/'//g" | stats avg(visibility) as visibility_avg | eval Visibility=round(visibility_avg,0) | eval "Visibility (in Meters)" = case(Visibility==1, "Below 2 m", Visibility==2, "2-6 m", Visibility==3, "6-10 m", Visibility==4, "10-20 m", Visibility==5, "Greater than 20 m") | fields - Visibility visibility_avg

reverse | rex max_match=0 field=_raw "sample(.*?)depth=\'(?<depth>[\d\.\sm]+)\'" | rex max_match=0 field=_raw "sample(.*?)time=\'(?<time>[0-9:]+)" | rex max_match=0 field=_raw "sample(.*?)pressure=\'(?<pressure>[0-9\.]+)" | rex max_match=0 field=_raw "sample(.*?)temp=\'(?<temp>.*)\'" | rex mode=sed field=_raw "s/[\r\n.]*<sample//g" | table number time depth pressure divesitename buddy | eval myuuid=mvrange(0,mvcount(depth)) | mvexpand myuuid | eval time=mvindex(time,myuuid) | eval depth=mvindex(depth,myuuid) | eval pressure=mvindex(pressure,myuuid) | eval divesitename=mvindex(divesitename,myuuid) | replace "'1.013 bar'" with "" in pressure | rex mode=sed field=pressure "s/ bar//g" | rex mode=sed field=number "s/'//g" | rex mode=sed field=depth "s/ m//g" | rex mode=sed field=time "s/ min//g" | rex field=time "(?<min>\d+):(?<sec>\d+)" | eval total_sec=min*60+sec | fields - myuuid min sec | stats range(pressure) as pressure_range range(total_sec) as second_range values(divesitename) values(buddy) max(pressure) min(pressure) by number | eval rate_of_air=pressure_range/second_range*60 | sort + number | rename pressure_range as "Air Consumed" "values(divesitename)" as "Dive Site" "rate_of_air" AS "Air Consumption Rate (bars/Minute)" number as "Dive Number" "values(buddy)" as "Dive Buddy" "max(pressure)" as "Starting Pressure" "min(pressure)" as "Ending Pressure" | eval "Total Dive Time (minutes)"=round(second_range/60, 2) | fields - second_range "Dive Buddy" "Dive Site"
reverse | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count by divesitename

rex field=duration mode=sed "s/'//g" | rex field=duration mode=sed "s/ min//g" | reverse | table duration divesitename | rex field=duration "(?<minutes>\d+):(?<seconds>\d+)" | eval total_seconds=minutes*60+seconds | sort + divesitename | stats sum(total_seconds) as "total_hours" by divesitename | eval total_hours=round(total_hours/60/60,2) | rename total_hours AS "Total Hours Under Water" | rename divesitename as "Dive Site"
